name: Flying stick
description:
This game is about flying a stick. She was flying and gaining speed. You control her and turn to the right and to the left. The first 10 levels too easy and boring, 11 - 20 warm-up, and 21 levels it's a real game! This is my first game, hope You like it (I tried to add a bit of hard).

I draw very badly  :(

The game also has a small music.
